description:
ScenarioMIP SSP5-85 forcing in a model with interactive ice sheets. 
The set up follows the set up for the standard ScenarioMIP SSP5-85, which may therefore first require the CMIP6 Historical simulation to be performed too with a coupled AOGCM-ISM setting.
keywords: ISMIP6, Tier 2, SSP5-85 forcing, interactive ISM, interactive ice sheets
long_name: SSP5-85 scenario with interactive ice sheets

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the end of the 21st century.
requirements.label: 2015-2100 86yrs

requirements.description:
Impose RCP8.5 forcing.
Represents the high end of the range of plausible future forcing pathways.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP8.5
requirements.label: RCP85 Forcing

requirements.description: The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which includes future solar forcing (2015-2299).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
requirements.keywords: Solar Forcing, Future, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
requirements.label: Future Solar Irradiance Forcing

requirements.description: Future solar particle forcing (2015-2299). For models with interactive stratospheric chemstiry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair produciont by galactic gosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
requirements.keywords: Solar forcing, Future, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
requirements.label: Future Solar Particle Forcing

requirements.description: Initialisation is from the end of an historical simulation with interactive ice sheets
requirements.label: HistoricalISMInitialisation

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model or an Earth System Model with interactive ice sheets
requirements.keywords: AOGCM-ISM, ESM-ISM, Atmosphere-Ocean-IceSheet, Earth System, Model, Configuration
requirements.label: AOGCM-ISM Configuration
